    • isGameOver

      public boolean isGameOver()
      This code loops to check whether it is over and passes a special condition
      返回:
      true end will return true

    • makeReplacement

      public void makeReplacement​(char letterToReplace, char replacementLetter)
      参数:
      letterToReplace - This is the word that needs to be replaced
      replacementLetter - This is the value corresponding to the word to be replaced.

    • getEncryptedQuote

      public java.lang.String getEncryptedQuote()
      This is a very complex code, it will return complex correspondence.
      返回:
      Then print out the answer.

    • getUsersProgress

      public java.lang.String getUsersProgress()
      This is a function added by myself. It will check how many unfinished corresponding characters are still before the end of the check, and how many uncorresponding characters are left in the return.
      返回:
      how many uncorresponding characters are left in the return.

    • goOver

      public void goOver()
      This is a help to force the end code, after using it, when isgameover checks here, you will find the exit input. Finally, the game is forced to end.

      public void help()
      print help
